summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Shadow-Jitsu
Review Date: 2013/11/27
Store: MY
Categories: Movies & TV, TV
Product Description: ['Over 15 bodyweight training tutorials 4 Follow Along Workouts 8-Week Workout Plan Moderate-Advanced Level Workouts Professionally Mixed Workout Music Perfect for MMA, Jiu Jitsu, & Combat Athletes If you’re looking to enhance your conditioning & agility, it’s time to start training with Shadow-Jitsu, a killer form of bodyweight training that combines Jiu Jitsu, wrestling, boxing, and kick boxing exercises into a crazy, heartpounding workout. Former professional MMA fighter and trainer Joey Alvarado takes you through each exercise step-by-step, then seemlessly combines the movements into a series of high intensity workouts that will have your sweat poring. Take your endurance to new levels while improving your agility, balance, coordination, and strength with dynamic full body movements. The Shadow-Jitsu Workout DVD includes over 90 minues of content with 15 step-by-step exercise tutorials and 4 bodyweight workouts. You’ll also get a 4 week workout plan that will guide you towards realistic functional fitness. Content Breakdown: Instructionals: 20min Workout 1: 10 min Workout 2: 10 min Workout 3: 30 min Workout 4a: 10 min Workout 4b: 5 min']
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Item Package Dimensions L x W x H': '7.5 x 5.3 x 0.6 inches', 'Package Weight': '2.4 Ounces', 'Brand Name': 'MY', 'Manufacturer': 'mymadmethods', 'Part Number': 'SHADOW1', 'Date First Available': 'July 26, 2011'}
Review Text: Difficult interface. Have to almost go through training sequence recording before you get to exercises. As such quickly lost favor with me.
Review Title: Good idea lacks quality
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ip Man 3 (English Subtitled)
Review Date: 2016/07/11
Categories: International, Historical, Electrifying, Outlandish
Product Description: ["Martial arts master Ip springs into action when his son's school is threatened by a shady American, then defends his status as wing chun champion."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English'], 'Directors': ['Wilson Yip'], 'Producers': ['Isabella Chang', 'Kaishuai Feng', 'Jian-Xiang Shi', 'Alvina Wong', 'Edmond Wong', 'Raymond Pak-Ming Wong'], 'Starring': ['Donnie Yen', 'Mike Tyson', 'Max Zhang']}
Review Text: Have seen all three and I enjoy it, as someone who grew up watching kickas this is top rate.
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Date: 2016/07/11
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Wilson Yip'], 'Producers': ['Raymond Wong'], 'Starring': ['Sammo Humg', 'Darren Shahlavi', 'Simon Yam'], 'Studio': ['Mandarin Films Distribution Co.']}
Review Text: Master piece, The lead actor does a good job of not over playing the role.
Review Title: The lead actor does a good job of not over playing the role

raw_response:
**SUMMARY:**
The individual displays a clear preference for action-oriented content, particularly martial arts and high-energy films, as evidenced by their multiple high ratings for similar genres. They enjoy films featuring intense fight scenes and dynamic choreography, suggesting a strong appreciation for physicality and action within narratives. 

In terms of quality, the user exhibits some variability; while they have awarded top ratings to prominent action filmmakers and series, they have also expressed dissatisfaction with a specific product due to quality and usability issues, indicating a need for practicality in their media consumption. This suggests a low tolerance for products that do not meet their expectations of quality, particularly if they interfere with the experience.

The purchase history also indicates that they are relatively price-sensitive, as evidenced by notable differences in ratings that stem from perceived value or enjoyment levels. The user consistently favors products that deliver compelling action and engaging storytelling while being wary of low-quality offerings, indicating that they prioritize both quality and entertainment in their choices. Overall, the core preferences center around high-quality action films, particularly those with martial arts or combat themes, alongside a critical perspective on usability and value.

target_interaction.title: One of my all time favorite Denzel movies
target_interaction.text: One of my all time favorite Denzel movies, could watch over and over again without getting bored. Not many movies grab my attention like that
